changeSet.author: intelligence-operative
changeSet.comment:
Create view_riksdagen_parliamentary_session_summary
Provides comprehensive metrics for each riksmöte (parliamentary session). Uses the rm column which contains values like "2025/26", "2024/25", etc. Sessions run from September to August, aligned with Swedish parliamentary calendar.
Intelligence Value: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ HIGH Enables session-based longitudinal analysis of Swedish democracy
changeSet.createView: SELECT rm AS parliamentary_session, COUNT(DISTINCT embedded_id_ballot_id) AS total_ballots, COUNT(DISTINCT embedded_id_intressent_id) AS active_politicians, COUNT(*) AS total_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Ja') AS yes_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Nej') AS no_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Avstår') AS abstain_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') AS absent_votes, ROUND(AVG(born_year), 0) AS avg_born_year, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE gender = 'MAN') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS percentage_male, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE gender = 'KVINNA') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS percentage_female, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Ja') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS avg_yes_rate, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Nej') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS avg_no_rate, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Avstår') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS avg_abstain_rate, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS avg_absent_rate, COUNT(DISTINCT party) AS active_parties, MIN(vote_date) AS session_first_vote, MAX(vote_date) AS session_last_vote, -- Election year indicator (elections typically held in September) CASE WHEN rm IN ('2025/26', '2021/22', '2017/18', '2013/14', '2009/10', '2005/06', '2001/02') THEN true ELSE false END AS is_election_year FROM vote_data WHERE rm IS NOT NULL GROUP BY rm ORDER BY rm DESC;

changeSet.author: intelligence-operative
changeSet.comment:
Create view_riksdagen_politician_parliamentary_session_performance
Tracks individual politician performance metrics across riksmöte sessions. Enables career trajectory analysis based on parliamentary sessions.
Intelligence Value: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ VERY HIGH Critical for politician scorecards and performance tracking
changeSet.createView: SELECT rm AS parliamentary_session, embedded_id_intressent_id AS person_id, MAX(first_name) AS first_name, MAX(last_name) AS last_name, MAX(party) AS party, MAX(gender) AS gender, MAX(born_year) AS born_year, COUNT(DISTINCT embedded_id_ballot_id) AS ballot_participation, COUNT(*) AS total_votes_cast, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Ja') AS yes_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Nej') AS no_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Avstår') AS abstain_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') AS absent_votes, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Ja') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS yes_rate, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Nej') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS no_rate, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Avstår') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS abstain_rate, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS absent_rate, ROUND(100.0 - (100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)), 2) AS attendance_score FROM vote_data WHERE rm IS NOT NULL AND embedded_id_intressent_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY rm, embedded_id_intressent_id ORDER BY rm DESC, attendance_score DESC NULLS LAST;

changeSet.author: intelligence-operative
changeSet.comment:
Create view_riksdagen_party_parliamentary_session_trends
Analyzes party evolution across riksmöte sessions including size, voting behavior, and market share trends.
Intelligence Value: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ VERY HIGH Essential for coalition analysis and electoral forecasting
changeSet.createView: WITH party_session_stats AS ( SELECT rm AS parliamentary_session, party, COUNT(DISTINCT embedded_id_intressent_id) AS party_size, COUNT(DISTINCT embedded_id_ballot_id) AS ballots_participated, COUNT(*) AS total_party_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Ja') AS party_yes_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Nej') AS party_no_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Avstår') AS party_abstain_votes, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') AS party_absent_votes, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Ja') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS party_yes_rate, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Nej') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS party_no_rate, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS party_absent_rate, ROUND(100.0 - (100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)), 2) AS party_attendance_rate FROM vote_data WHERE rm IS NOT NULL AND party IS NOT NULL GROUP BY rm, party ), party_with_market_share AS ( SELECT pss.*, SUM(party_size) OVER (PARTITION BY parliamentary_session) AS total_politicians_in_session, ROUND(100.0 * party_size / NULLIF(SUM(party_size) OVER (PARTITION BY parliamentary_session), 0), 2) AS party_market_share FROM party_session_stats pss ) SELECT parliamentary_session, party, party_size, ballots_participated, total_party_votes, party_yes_votes, party_no_votes, party_abstain_votes, party_absent_votes, party_yes_rate, party_no_rate, party_absent_rate, party_attendance_rate, party_market_share, -- Party size ranking within session RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY parliamentary_session ORDER BY party_size DESC) AS size_rank, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY parliamentary_session ORDER BY party_attendance_rate DESC) AS attendance_rank FROM party_with_market_share ORDER BY parliamentary_session DESC, party_size DESC;

changeSet.author: intelligence-operative
changeSet.comment:
Create view_riksdagen_parliamentary_session_comparative_analysis
Advanced statistical analysis using LAG(), LEAD(), z-scores, and historical baselines. Compares each riksmöte against previous sessions and historical averages.
Intelligence Value: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ VERY HIGH Critical for detecting anomalies and tracking parliamentary evolution
changeSet.createView: WITH parliamentary_session_stats AS ( SELECT rm AS parliamentary_session, COUNT(DISTINCT embedded_id_ballot_id) AS total_ballots, COUNT(DISTINCT embedded_id_intressent_id) AS active_politicians, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Ja') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS avg_yes_rate, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS avg_absent_rate, COUNT(DISTINCT party) AS active_parties FROM vote_data WHERE rm IS NOT NULL GROUP BY rm ), parliamentary_session_with_comparisons AS ( SELECT parliamentary_session, total_ballots, active_politicians, avg_yes_rate, avg_absent_rate, active_parties, -- Period-over-period comparisons using LAG() LAG(total_ballots, 1) OVER (ORDER BY parliamentary_session) AS prev_parliamentary_session_ballots, LAG(avg_yes_rate, 1) OVER (ORDER BY parliamentary_session) AS prev_parliamentary_session_yes_rate, LEAD(total_ballots, 1) OVER (ORDER BY parliamentary_session DESC) AS next_parliamentary_session_ballots, -- Historical context FIRST_VALUE(total_ballots) OVER (ORDER BY parliamentary_session) AS baseline_ballots, LAST_VALUE(total_ballots) OVER (ORDER BY parliamentary_session ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS latest_ballots, AVG(total_ballots) OVER () AS historical_avg_ballots, STDDEV(total_ballots) OVER () AS historical_stddev_ballots, -- Ranking RANK() OVER (ORDER BY total_ballots DESC) AS ballot_productivity_rank, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY avg_absent_rate ASC) AS attendance_quality_rank FROM parliamentary_session_stats ) SELECT parliamentary_session, total_ballots, active_politicians, avg_yes_rate, avg_absent_rate, active_parties, prev_parliamentary_session_ballots, prev_parliamentary_session_yes_rate, next_parliamentary_session_ballots, baseline_ballots, latest_ballots, ROUND(historical_avg_ballots, 2) AS historical_avg_ballots, ROUND(historical_stddev_ballots, 2) AS historical_stddev_ballots, -- Change calculations ROUND(100.0 * (total_ballots - prev_parliamentary_session_ballots) / NULLIF(prev_parliamentary_session_ballots, 0), 2) AS ballot_change_pct, ROUND(avg_yes_rate - prev_parliamentary_session_yes_rate, 2) AS yes_rate_change, -- Z-score for anomaly detection ROUND((total_ballots - historical_avg_ballots) / NULLIF(historical_stddev_ballots, 0), 2) AS ballot_zscore, -- Rankings ballot_productivity_rank, attendance_quality_rank, -- Classification based on z-score CASE WHEN ABS((total_ballots - historical_avg_ballots) / NULLIF(historical_stddev_ballots, 0)) > 2 THEN 'ANOMALOUS' WHEN (total_ballots - historical_avg_ballots) / NULLIF(historical_stddev_ballots, 0) > 1 THEN 'ABOVE_AVERAGE' WHEN (total_ballots - historical_avg_ballots) / NULLIF(historical_stddev_ballots, 0) < -1 THEN 'BELOW_AVERAGE' ELSE 'TYPICAL' END AS activity_classification FROM parliamentary_session_with_comparisons ORDER BY parliamentary_session DESC;

changeSet.author: intelligence-operative
changeSet.comment:
Create view_riksdagen_politician_parliamentary_session_rankings
Advanced politician performance rankings using PERCENT_RANK() and NTILE(). Identifies top/bottom performers and classifies politicians into quartiles.
Intelligence Value: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ VERY HIGH Essential for politician scorecards and Hall of Fame/Shame identification
changeSet.createView: WITH politician_stats AS ( SELECT rm AS parliamentary_session, embedded_id_intressent_id AS person_id, MAX(first_name) AS first_name, MAX(last_name) AS last_name, MAX(party) AS party, COUNT(DISTINCT embedded_id_ballot_id) AS ballot_participation, ROUND(100.0 - (100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)), 2) AS attendance_score, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Ja') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS yes_rate FROM vote_data WHERE rm IS NOT NULL AND embedded_id_intressent_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY rm, embedded_id_intressent_id ), politician_volatility AS ( SELECT rm AS parliamentary_session, embedded_id_intressent_id AS person_id, STDDEV(CASE WHEN vote = 'Ja' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END) AS vote_volatility FROM vote_data WHERE rm IS NOT NULL AND embedded_id_intressent_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY rm, embedded_id_intressent_id ) SELECT ps.parliamentary_session, ps.person_id, ps.first_name, ps.last_name, ps.party, ps.ballot_participation, ps.attendance_score, ps.yes_rate, -- Percentile rankings (0.0 to 1.0 scale) ROUND(PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.attendance_score DESC)::numeric, 4) AS attendance_percentile, ROUND(PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.ballot_participation DESC)::numeric, 4) AS participation_percentile, -- Quartile groupings (1-4) NTILE(4) OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.attendance_score DESC) AS attendance_quartile, NTILE(4) OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.ballot_participation DESC) AS participation_quartile, -- Session-wide rankings RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.attendance_score DESC) AS session_attendance_rank, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.ballot_participation DESC) AS session_participation_rank, -- Party-level rankings RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session, ps.party ORDER BY ps.attendance_score DESC) AS party_attendance_rank, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session, ps.party ORDER BY ps.ballot_participation DESC) AS party_participation_rank, -- Performance tier classification CASE WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.attendance_score DESC) < 0.05 THEN 'HALL_OF_FAME' WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.attendance_score DESC) < 0.25 THEN 'EXCELLENT' WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.attendance_score DESC) < 0.75 THEN 'GOOD' WHEN PERCENT_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session ORDER BY ps.attendance_score DESC) < 0.95 THEN 'NEEDS_IMPROVEMENT' ELSE 'HALL_OF_SHAME' END AS performance_tier, -- Party MVP designation CASE WHEN RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ps.parliamentary_session, ps.party ORDER BY ps.attendance_score DESC) = 1 THEN true ELSE false END AS is_party_mvp, -- Consistency rating (based on vote volatility) CASE WHEN pv.vote_volatility < 0.2 THEN 'VERY_CONSISTENT' WHEN pv.vote_volatility < 0.3 THEN 'CONSISTENT' WHEN pv.vote_volatility < 0.4 THEN 'MODERATE' ELSE 'INCONSISTENT' END AS consistency_rating FROM politician_stats ps LEFT JOIN politician_volatility pv ON ps.parliamentary_session = pv.parliamentary_session AND ps.person_id = pv.person_id ORDER BY ps.parliamentary_session DESC, ps.attendance_score DESC NULLS LAST;

changeSet.author: intelligence-operative
changeSet.comment:
Create view_riksdagen_party_parliamentary_session_momentum
Party momentum analysis using moving averages, velocity, and acceleration metrics. Enables coalition forecasting and party trajectory analysis.
Intelligence Value: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ VERY HIGH Critical for electoral forecasting and coalition potential assessment
changeSet.createView: WITH party_session_data AS ( SELECT rm AS parliamentary_session, party, COUNT(DISTINCT embedded_id_intressent_id) AS party_size, ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE vote = 'Frånvarande') / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0), 2) AS absent_rate FROM vote_data WHERE rm IS NOT NULL AND party IS NOT NULL GROUP BY rm, party ), party_with_trends AS ( SELECT parliamentary_session, party, party_size, absent_rate, -- Market share calculation ROUND(100.0 * party_size / NULLIF(SUM(party_size) OVER (PARTITION BY parliamentary_session), 0), 2) AS market_share, -- Previous session metrics using LAG() LAG(party_size, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY party ORDER BY parliamentary_session) AS prev_session_size, LAG(party_size, 2) OVER (PARTITION BY party ORDER BY parliamentary_session) AS prev_2_session_size, -- Moving averages (3-session window) AVG(party_size) OVER (PARTITION BY party ORDER BY parliamentary_session ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS moving_avg_size_3session, -- Standard deviation for volatility STDDEV(party_size) OVER (PARTITION BY party ORDER BY parliamentary_session ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS size_volatility_3session, -- Calculate size_change_pct in CTE ROUND(100.0 * (party_size - LAG(party_size, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY party ORDER BY parliamentary_session)) / NULLIF(LAG(party_size, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY party ORDER BY parliamentary_session), 0), 2) AS size_change_pct FROM party_session_data ) SELECT parliamentary_session, party, party_size, absent_rate, market_share, prev_session_size, ROUND(moving_avg_size_3session, 2) AS moving_avg_size_3session, ROUND(size_volatility_3session, 2) AS size_volatility, -- Velocity (rate of change) ROUND(party_size - prev_session_size, 0) AS size_change_1session, size_change_pct, -- Acceleration (change in velocity) ROUND((party_size - prev_session_size) - (prev_session_size - prev_2_session_size), 0) AS size_acceleration, -- Momentum classification CASE WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) > 10 THEN 'SURGING' WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) > 5 THEN 'RISING' WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) > 0 THEN 'GROWING' WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) < -10 THEN 'COLLAPSING' WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) < -5 THEN 'FALLING' WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) < 0 THEN 'DECLINING' ELSE 'STABLE' END AS momentum_classification, -- Trajectory analysis CASE WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) > 0 AND ((party_size - prev_session_size) - (prev_session_size - prev_2_session_size)) > 0 THEN 'ACCELERATING_GROWTH' WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) > 0 AND ((party_size - prev_session_size) - (prev_session_size - prev_2_session_size)) < 0 THEN 'DECELERATING_GROWTH' WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) < 0 AND ((party_size - prev_session_size) - (prev_session_size - prev_2_session_size)) < 0 THEN 'ACCELERATING_DECLINE' WHEN (party_size - prev_session_size) < 0 AND ((party_size - prev_session_size) - (prev_session_size - prev_2_session_size)) > 0 THEN 'DECELERATING_DECLINE' ELSE 'STABLE' END AS trajectory, -- Coalition potential score (market share + momentum) ROUND(market_share + COALESCE(size_change_pct, 0) * 0.5, 2) AS coalition_potential_score, -- Size ranking within session RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY parliamentary_session ORDER BY party_size DESC) AS size_rank FROM party_with_trends ORDER BY parliamentary_session DESC, party_size DESC;

changeSet.author: intelligence-operative
changeSet.comment:
Create view_riksdagen_parliamentary_session_volatility_analysis
Behavioral volatility analysis using coefficient of variation and stability scores. Identifies erratic performers and behavioral consistency patterns.
Intelligence Value: ⭐⭐⭐⭐ HIGH Important for risk assessment and behavioral pattern recognition
changeSet.createView: WITH politician_session_votes AS ( SELECT rm AS parliamentary_session, embedded_id_intressent_id AS person_id, MAX(first_name) AS first_name, MAX(last_name) AS last_name, MAX(party) AS party, COUNT(*) AS total_votes, AVG(CASE WHEN vote = 'Ja' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END) AS avg_yes_vote, STDDEV(CASE WHEN vote = 'Ja' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END) AS stddev_yes_vote, AVG(CASE WHEN vote = 'Frånvarande' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END) AS avg_absent, STDDEV(CASE WHEN vote = 'Frånvarande' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END) AS stddev_absent FROM vote_data WHERE rm IS NOT NULL AND embedded_id_intressent_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY rm, embedded_id_intressent_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 10 -- Minimum sample size for statistical validity ), party_session_volatility AS ( SELECT parliamentary_session, party, AVG(stddev_yes_vote) AS party_avg_vote_volatility, STDDEV(stddev_yes_vote) AS party_vote_volatility_stddev FROM politician_session_votes WHERE party IS NOT NULL GROUP BY parliamentary_session, party ) SELECT psv.parliamentary_session, psv.person_id, psv.first_name, psv.last_name, psv.party, psv.total_votes, ROUND(psv.avg_yes_vote::numeric, 4) AS avg_yes_rate, ROUND(psv.stddev_yes_vote::numeric, 4) AS vote_stddev, ROUND(psv.avg_absent::numeric, 4) AS avg_absent_rate, -- Coefficient of Variation (normalized volatility metric) ROUND((100.0 * psv.stddev_yes_vote / NULLIF(psv.avg_yes_vote, 0))::numeric, 2) AS vote_coefficient_of_variation, ROUND((100.0 * psv.stddev_absent / NULLIF(psv.avg_absent, 0))::numeric, 2) AS absent_coefficient_of_variation, -- Stability score (0-100, higher = more stable) ROUND((100.0 - (100.0 * psv.stddev_yes_vote / NULLIF(psv.avg_yes_vote + 1, 0)))::numeric, 2) AS vote_stability_score, ROUND((100.0 - (100.0 * psv.stddev_absent / NULLIF(psv.avg_absent + 1, 0)))::numeric, 2) AS attendance_stability_score, -- Party context ROUND(pv.party_avg_vote_volatility::numeric, 4) AS party_avg_volatility, -- Volatility relative to party CASE WHEN psv.stddev_yes_vote > pv.party_avg_vote_volatility + pv.party_vote_volatility_stddev THEN 'HIGHLY_VOLATILE' WHEN psv.stddev_yes_vote > pv.party_avg_vote_volatility THEN 'ABOVE_PARTY_AVG' WHEN psv.stddev_yes_vote < pv.party_avg_vote_volatility - pv.party_vote_volatility_stddev THEN 'VERY_STABLE' ELSE 'TYPICAL' END AS volatility_relative_to_party, -- Risk assessment CASE WHEN psv.stddev_yes_vote > 0.4 THEN 'HIGH_RISK' WHEN psv.stddev_yes_vote > 0.3 THEN 'MODERATE_RISK' ELSE 'LOW_RISK' END AS behavioral_risk_level, -- Performance pattern classification CASE WHEN psv.avg_yes_vote > 0.7 AND psv.stddev_yes_vote < 0.2 THEN 'CONSISTENTLY_EXCELLENT' WHEN psv.avg_yes_vote > 0.5 AND psv.stddev_yes_vote < 0.3 THEN 'RELIABLE_PERFORMER' WHEN psv.stddev_yes_vote > 0.4 THEN 'ERRATIC_PERFORMER' WHEN psv.avg_yes_vote < 0.3 AND psv.stddev_yes_vote < 0.2 THEN 'CONSISTENTLY_OPPOSED' ELSE 'MODERATE_PERFORMER' END AS performance_pattern FROM politician_session_votes psv LEFT JOIN party_session_volatility pv ON psv.parliamentary_session = pv.parliamentary_session AND psv.party = pv.party ORDER BY psv.parliamentary_session DESC, psv.stddev_yes_vote DESC;
